id.description: The Discord snowflake of the user.

$schema.$comment: This is required otherwise the schema will fail itself when it is applied to a document via $schema. This is optional so that validators that use this schema don't fail if the metadata doesn't have the $schema property.

contributors.description: Any extra contributors to this presence.

service.description: The service this presence is for.

description.description: A description of the presence in multiple languages.

propertyNames.description: The language key. The key must be languagecode(_REGIONCODE).

^[a-z]{2}(?:_(?:[A-Z]{2}|[0-9]{1,3}))?$.description: The description of the presence in the key's language.

url.description: The service's website URL, or an array of URLs. Protocols should not be added.

items.description: One of the service's website URLs.

version.description: The SemVer version of the presence. Must just be major.minor.patch.

logo.description: The logo of the service this presence is for.

thumbnail.description: A thumbnail of the service this presence is for.

color.description: The theme color of the service this presence is for. Must be either a 6 digit or a 3 digit hex code.

category.description: The category the presence falls under.

iframe.description: Whether or not the presence should run in IFrames.

readLogs.description: Whether or not the extension should be reading logs.

regExp.description: A regular expression used to match URLs for the presence to inject into.

iFrameRegExp.description: A regular expression used to match IFrames for the presence to inject into.

button.description: Controls whether the presence is automatically added when the extension is installed. For partner presences only.

warning.description: Shows a warning saying that it requires additional steps for the presence to function correctly.

settings.description: An array of settings the user can change in the presence.

title.description: The title of the setting. Required only if `multiLanguage` is disabled.

icon.description: The icon of the setting. Required only if `multiLanguage` is disabled.

if.description: Restrict showing this setting if another setting is the defined value.

placeholder.description: The placeholder for settings that require input. Shown when the input is empty.

value.description: The default value of the setting. Not compatible with `values`.

values.description: The default values of the setting. Not compatible with `value`.

multiLanguage.description: When false, multi-localization is disabled. When true, strings from the `general.json` file are available for use. When a string, it is the name of a file (excluding .json) of a used language from the localization GitHub repo. When an array of strings, it is all of the file names (excluding .json) of used languages from the localization GitHub repo.

items.description: The name of a file from the localization GitHub repository.
